entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -38.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -38.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -41.6°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Near blizzard. High minus 31.
